mapper.select: select content from SYS_D_DECORATER where type_id = 'HOME_TOP_BANNAR' and data_key = 'IMG' and status = '1' order by order_seq

select * from ( select a.PARAM_VALUE goods_id, b.ctlg_code ctlg_code, b.goods_name goods_name, c.add_price/1000 goods_price, e.goods_amount goods_amount, f.photo_links photo_links from SYS_D_ESPPARAM a, GDS_D_INFO b, GDS_D_PRICE c, GDS_D_PHOTO f, GDS_D_AMOUNT e where a.PARAM_TYPE = 'RXHY' and a.PARAM_VALUE is not null and a.PARAM_VALUE = b.goods_id and b.goods_state = '1' and b.ctlg_code in (4, 9)
and b.MERCHANT_ID = #{mchId}
and a.PARAM_VALUE = c.goods_id and b.album_id = f.album_id and f.default_tag = '0' and e.amount_type = '2' and a.PARAM_VALUE = e.goods_id order by a.PARAM_CODE ) m
where rownum <= 4

select * from ( select a.PARAM_VALUE goods_id, b.ctlg_code ctlg_code, b.goods_name goods_name, c.add_price/1000 goods_price, e.goods_amount goods_amount, f.photo_links photo_links from SYS_D_ESPPARAM a, GDS_D_INFO b, GDS_D_PRICE c, GDS_D_PHOTO f, GDS_D_AMOUNT e where a.PARAM_TYPE = 'RXTC' and a.PARAM_VALUE is not null and a.PARAM_VALUE = b.goods_id and b.goods_state = '1' and b.ctlg_code in (5, 10)
and b.MERCHANT_ID = #{mchId}
and a.PARAM_VALUE = c.goods_id and b.album_id = f.album_id and f.default_tag = '0' and e.amount_type = '2' and a.PARAM_VALUE = e.goods_id order by a.PARAM_CODE ) m
where rownum <= 4

select * from ( select a.PARAM_VALUE goods_id, b.ctlg_code ctlg_code, b.goods_name goods_name, c.add_price/1000 goods_price, e.goods_amount goods_amount, f.photo_links photo_links from SYS_D_ESPPARAM a, GDS_D_INFO b, GDS_D_PRICE c, GDS_D_PHOTO f, GDS_D_AMOUNT e where a.PARAM_TYPE = 'RXWK' and a.PARAM_VALUE is not null and a.PARAM_VALUE = b.goods_id and b.goods_state = '1' and b.ctlg_code in (6, 11)
and b.MERCHANT_ID = #{mchId}
and a.PARAM_VALUE = c.goods_id and b.album_id = f.album_id and f.default_tag = '0' and e.amount_type = '2' and a.PARAM_VALUE = e.goods_id order by a.PARAM_CODE ) m
where rownum <= 4
select b.goods_id goods_id, f.photo_links photo_links from GDS_D_INFO b, GDS_D_PHOTO f where b.goods_id = ${goods_id} and b.album_id = f.album_id order by f.photo_no

select b.goods_id goods_id, b.ctlg_code ctlg_code, b.goods_name goods_name, b.content content, b.album_id album_id, b.ver_no ver_no, b.merchant_id merchant_id, b.create_time create_time, b.create_staff_id create_staff_id, b.goods_state goods_state, b.recom_tag recom_tag, b.price_rule price_rule, b.begin_time begin_time, b.end_time end_time, b.simp_desc simp_desc, c.original_price/1000 original_price, c.add_price/1000 goods_price, nvl(e.aty_title,'') aty_title from GDS_D_INFO b, GDS_D_PRICE c, (select * from GDS_D_ABLE_ACTIVITY where user_id=${user_id}) e where b.goods_id = ${goods_id} and b.goods_id = c.goods_id and b.goods_id = e.goods_id(+)
select ess_city_code city_code, city_name, ess_province_code province_code from SYS_P_WEB_CITY where ess_province_code='85' order by order_number

select a.goods_id , b.res_id, c.attr_code, c.attr_val_name, c.attr_val_code, c.values1 from GDS_D_INFO a , REL_GOODS_RES b, RES_D_ATTRVAL c where a.goods_id = ${goods_id} and a.goods_id = b.goods_id and b.res_id = c.res_id order by b.res_id,c.attr_code,c.seq_num
mapper.insert: insert into AUR_D_VISIT_LOG (log_id, partition_id, store_id, user_id,visit_time) values(#{log_id}, #{partition_id}, #{store_id}, #{user_id},sysdate )
mapper.select: select a.goods_id goods_id, a.goods_amount goods_amount from GDS_D_AMOUNT a where a.amount_type = '1' and a.goods_id = ${goods_id}
select to_char(a.goods_id) goods_id, to_char(a.ctlg_code) ctlg_code from gds_d_info a where a.goods_id = ${goods_id}
